snippet.title: Sweet Poison
snippet.description: Understand and break your addiction to sugar with David Gillespie's Sweet Poison. David Gillespie was 6 stone overweight, lethargic and desperate to lose weight fast - but he'd failed every diet out there.

snippet.title: Sweet Poison
snippet.description: Sweet Poison exposes one of the great health scourges of our time and offers a wealth of practical and accessible information on how to avoid fructose, increase your enjoyment of food and lose weight.

snippet.title: The Sweet Poison Quit Plan
snippet.description: Sugar is addictive and bad for us - The Sweet Poison Quit Plan by David Gillespie will to cure your sweet tooth When David Gillespie cut sugar from his diet he lost 6 stone - and it kept it off.

snippet.title: Sweet Poison Quit Plan Cookbook
snippet.description: If you don't eat sugar but still have kids to feed, birthday parties to throw, and guests popping in for morning tea, the solution is right here. These are the special treats that you can eat for the rest of your life.

snippet.title: Sugar Blues
snippet.description: Reviews the history and folklore, medical and otherwise, of refined sucrose and explains the ubiquitous chemical's threats to health

snippet.title: Bugs in My Brain, Poison on My Plate: Using M-Field Energy ...
snippet.description: Also in the group of “wrong foods” is sugar. Consider that refined sugar did not even exist until 400 years ago. Now, it is everywhere in copious amounts. I tell patients that the recipe for heartburn is to combine wheat and sugar together; they ...

snippet.title: Pure, White And Deadly: How sugar is killing us and what ...
snippet.description: Little wonder that no one listened to eminent nutritionist Professor John Yudkin when he called sugar 'pure, white and deadly' back in 1972 and quite rightly warned of the links between excessive consumption and heart disease' Catherine ...

snippet.title: Jungle King Secrets: A Libido-Liberating Lifestyle for ... - Page 117
snippet.description: Natural sugars present in fresh food, such as sweet fruits, vegetables, raw honey, etc. give the body what it needs to make ... stripped from it that the body needs to use it in a constructive way, rendering refined sugar a non- nutritional poison.

snippet.title: From Chocolate to Morphine: Everything You Need to Know ... - Page 10
snippet.description: Sugar is also a white powder that strongly affects the body, and some experts say that it affects mental function and mood ... or a poison? The body can burn it as a fuel, just like sugar or starch, but it causes intoxication and can kill in overdose.
